maze.logic

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • maze.logic.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class aggregates all other classes, in order to create and update the game itself. Most classes interact here.

        public boolean getExit()
        Returns:
        True if the Dragon is dead. False otherwise.

      • initGame

        public void initGame(char dragonMode)
        Sets up the positions of the Hero, the Dragon, and the Sword and Updates the Dragon's mode.
        Parameters:
        dragonMode - i if Dragon is idle, r if Dragon moves randomly, s if Dragon is sleeping.

      • showGame
